Plot: After losing his job, his car and his money, Phuchit, Krissada Sukosol, races against time to complete 13 tasks ordered by an anonymous caller who promised 100,000,000 Thai Baht upon completion.
Title: 13: Game of Death
Writer: Eakasit Thairaat (story), Eakasit Thairaat (screenplay), Chookiat Sakveerakul (screenplay)
Actors: Krissada Sukosol, Achita Sikamana, Sarunyu Wongkrachang, Nattapong Arunnate
